name: SendGrid Tool
natural_language_description: 这是 SendGrid Tool 节点。主要用于: Consume SendGrid API

descriptionType.name: descriptionType
descriptionType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Tool Description | 默认值: auto
available_options: Set Automatically (值: auto) - Automatically set based on resource and operation
Set Manually (值: manual) - Manually set the description

toolDescription.name: toolDescription
toolDescription.description: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often
toolDescription.natural_language_description: 参数名: Description | 作用: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often | 默认值: Consume SendGrid API | (必填项)

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: list | (必填项)

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: send

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit
returnAll.natural_language_description: 参数名: Return All | 作用: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit | 默认值: False

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.natural_language_description: 参数名: Limit | 作用: Max number of results to return | 默认值: 100

name.name: name
name.natural_language_description: 参数名: Name | 作用: Name of the list | (必填项)

listId.name: listId
listId.natural_language_description: 参数名: List ID | 作用: ID of the list | (必填项)

deleteContacts.name: deleteContacts
deleteContacts.description: Whether to delete all contacts on the list
deleteContacts.natural_language_description: 参数名: Delete Contacts | 作用: Whether to delete all contacts on the list | 默认值: False

contactSample.name: contactSample
contactSample.description: Whether to return the contact sample
contactSample.natural_language_description: 参数名: Contact Sample | 作用: Whether to return the contact sample | 默认值: False

filters.name: filters
filters.natural_language_description: 参数名: Filters | 默认值: {}
available_options: query (值: None) - The query field accepts valid SGQL for searching for a contact

email.name: email
email.natural_language_description: 参数名: Email | 作用: Email of the contact | (必填项)

additionalFields.name: additionalFields
additionalFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Additional Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: attachments (值: None) - Comma-separated list of binary properties
bccEmail (值: None) - Comma-separated list of emails of the recipients of a blind carbon copy of the email
categories (值: None) - Comma-separated list of categories. Each category name may not exceed 255 characters.
ccEmail (值: None) - Comma-separated list of emails of the recipients of a carbon copy of the email
enableSandbox (值: None) - Whether to use to the sandbox for testing out email-sending functionality
ipPoolName (值: None) - The IP Pool that you would like to send this email from
replyToEmail (值: None) - Comma-separated list of email addresses that will appear in the reply-to field of the email
sendAt (值: None) - When to deliver the email. Scheduling more than 72 hours in advance is forbidden.

ids.name: ids
ids.description: ID of the contact. Multiple can be added separated by comma.
ids.natural_language_description: 参数名: Contact IDs | 作用: ID of the contact. Multiple can be added separated by comma.

deleteAll.name: deleteAll
deleteAll.description: Whether all contacts will be deleted
deleteAll.natural_language_description: 参数名: Delete All | 作用: Whether all contacts will be deleted | 默认值: False

by.name: by
by.description: Search the user by ID or email
by.natural_language_description: 参数名: By | 作用: Search the user by ID or email | 默认值: id | (必填项)

contactId.name: contactId
contactId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Contact ID | 作用: ID of the contact | (必填项)

fromEmail.name: fromEmail
fromEmail.description: Email address of the sender of the email
fromEmail.natural_language_description: 参数名: Sender Email | 作用: Email address of the sender of the email

fromName.name: fromName
fromName.description: Name of the sender of the email
fromName.natural_language_description: 参数名: Sender Name | 作用: Name of the sender of the email

toEmail.name: toEmail
toEmail.description: Comma-separated list of recipient email addresses
toEmail.natural_language_description: 参数名: Recipient Email | 作用: Comma-separated list of recipient email addresses

subject.name: subject
subject.description: Subject of the email to send
subject.natural_language_description: 参数名: Subject | 作用: Subject of the email to send

dynamicTemplate.name: dynamicTemplate
dynamicTemplate.description: Whether this email will contain a dynamic template
dynamicTemplate.natural_language_description: 参数名: Dynamic Template | 作用: Whether this email will contain a dynamic template | 默认值: False | (必填项)

contentType.name: contentType
contentType.description: MIME type of the email to send
contentType.natural_language_description: 参数名: MIME Type | 作用: MIME type of the email to send | 默认值: text/plain

contentValue.name: contentValue
contentValue.description: Message body of the email to send
contentValue.natural_language_description: 参数名: Message Body | 作用: Message body of the email to send | (必填项)

templateId.name: templateId
templateId.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression
templateId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Template Name or ID | 作用: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression | 默认值: []

dynamicTemplateFields.name: dynamicTemplateFields
dynamicTemplateFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Dynamic Template Fields | 默认值: {}
